Message:
I accompanied
the man with the staff,
and we headed towards
the Stargazing Tower.

With each step inside,
I felt us drawing closer
to the Princess’s heart.

This thick, enshrouding fog was
surely the very manifestation
of her anxieties.

The Princess had always
feigned composure,
all while being afraid
someone might die.

Many saw that as strength,
and none had ever tried
looking behind her facade.

I’m just as guilty.
I never noticed
how you truly felt...

But...it’s clear to me now...
The meaning behind
your words that day.

We finally arrived
at the top of the tower.
There she was,
as if reigning supreme over
all that lay beneath her feet.
